About Me

Hello, my name is Jaehun Baek. I am currently a student at Georgia Tech pursuing a B.S./M.S. in Computer Science with concentration on Information/Internetworks and Modeling/Simulation. My interests inclue Compilers, Machine Learning, High Performance Computing, and Quantum Computing. To reach me, contact me at: jbaek90 [at] gatech.edu
